p: Arbitrarily, three levels of biofilm inhibition were considered to qualitatively cluster the EOs potencies: strong biofilm inhibition in the range 0–40% of residual biofilm, mild inhibition in the range 40–80% and no biofilm inhibition over 80% of residual biofilm, respectively. In some cases, an increase of biofilm formation was highlighted after the treatment. As reported in Figure 1A, almost all EOs samples derived from FV showed to be able in inhibiting biofilm formation of P. aeruginosa PaO1, the only exception was the FO1 sample.
